entry.title: | A speech-to-text batch tool
entry.summary:
How to wreck a nice beach

People are starting to warm up to speech-to-text tools available from commercial off the shelf application software, text editors in desktop and mobile operating systems, and in cloud-based document editors. But what if you have a large-ish number of audio files Introducing a speech-to-text â€¦
entry.content:
How to wreck a nice beach

People are starting to warm up to speech-to-text tools available from commercial off the shelf application software, text editors in desktop and mobile operating systems, and in cloud-based document editors. But what if you have a large-ish number of audio files Introducing a speech-to-text cloud api wrapper for google cloud speech to text api and ibm watson speech to text api.

Background
